quotes.quote: Alcoholism is an imperfect spiritual longing.
One key symptom of alcoholism is that the individual comes to need a drink for every mood--one to calm down, one to perk up, one to celebrate, one to deal with disappointment, and so on.
Alcoholism is a devastating, potentially fatal disease. The primary symptom of having it is telling everyone--including yourself--that you are not an alcoholic.
Alcoholism is a well documented pathological reaction to unresolved grief.
Alcoholism is a disease of the whole person.
Alcoholism is the disease of more.
Alcoholism is the only disease that you can get yelled at for having.
Physicians who are familiar with alcoholism agree there is no such thing as making a normal drinker out of an alcoholic.
I became a very angry person and it was all due to alcoholism.
Herb is the healing of a nation, alcohol is the destruction.
Alcohol does not solve problems but becomes a problem in itself.
A drinking man's someone who wants to forget he isn't still young and believing.
Drunkenness is nothing but voluntary madness.
Drunkenness is temporary suicide.
A drinker has a hole under his nose that all his money runs into.
Alcohol is a good preservative for everything but brains.
Alcoholism and drug addiction are killer of mental and physical health. Alcoholic and drug addicts are killing themselves slowly.
Alcoholism is a thief of health, mental sanity and human dignity.
Alcoholism is above all a disease of denial.
Alcoholism is a choice... not a life sentence.
Alcoholism or addiction is a disease because it fits the definition of disease. It is progressive and chronic, and left untreated, it will kill.
Alcohol is a very patient drug. It will wait for the alcoholic to pick it up one more time.
Alcohol is the anesthesia by which we endure the operation of life.
The first thing in the human personality that dissolves in alcohol is dignity.
The intermediate stage between socialism and capitalism is alcoholism.
When the wine goes in, strange things come out.
Alcoholism does more havoc than three historical scourge together; famine, plague and war.
Alcohol decimated the working class and so many people.
Alcohol is the cause of all my problems.
